attributes.action: Designate the first Wednesday in August every year "Wiggo Wednesday"
attributes.additional_details: To celebrate the outstanding sporting achievement of Bradley Wiggins, the first Wednesday of August (Bradley's Olympic Time Trial gold medal was won on 1 August at the London 2012 Games) every year should be designated "Wiggo Wednesday". To celebrate the day, people should be allowed to wear stick-on sideburns to their place of work, or school, for a small fee. Monies collected would be donated to local sports clubs and charities for young people. This annual event would ensure his achievement is remembered for generations to come.
